arts.ttl: CorSport: Allegri tests new system in training – the idea for Lecce-Milan
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon On Matchday 2, Massimiliano Allegri is already thinking of making changes to his AC Milan set-up, including a new formation. The 3-5-2 trialled against Cremonese did not work, Milan looked disjointed, and lost poorly. However, this is not the only idea that has been trialled in pre-season.
